metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16239 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
process_http_response in OpenConnect before 8.05 has a Buffer Overflow when a malicious server uses HTTP chunked encoding with crafted chunk sizes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 7.08-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
openconnect - 7.08-3ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.08-3ubuntu0.18.04.2').
